title: Wasn't Zyra a part of the mid-year Mage update?
body: Where is her post on the Dev Corner??

replies.body: SOONtm
*Soon™

$®©и™©®

Please let her keep the plants. and Make them do something actually
also, better passive please

P.S. Let her be a mid laner still
Im 98% sure they are keeping her in mid lane.
Mid-year Mage Update = Mid Laner Mage Update Confirmed.
Literally been refreshing the boards for days waiting to see if my favorite champion is going to be gutted XD
The different champs need different amount of work and some peopel are involved with several champs. Repertoir for exampkle has only done stuff on malzahar sofar, but nothing public on Cassiopeia.

Ok, how did I miss that? 0o
cuz u r a dumb
Define "a dumb"
While not a true noun, his point is rather straight forward
a person who isn't smart, duh.

A person who isn't a smart, duh.

Ftfy
thx smart frend
WHAT what is he doing with malz ;-----;
If i remeber right, mostly making sure that AP Malz actually cares about his voidlings somewhat, While Keeping AD Malz a voidling focussed option.
Which sounds awesome.

\*cries*

Zyra mains have had to wait each week hoping our champ would be the next to be posted in the Dev Corner... 

Now it's taking significantly longer than any other Dev update (between the previous mage) to be posted 

I'm actually starting to have this internalized hatred for Vladimir from seeing his name instead of Zyra every time I check Dev Corner.

{{item:3070}} {{champion:143}} {{item:3070}}

Should be this week, so you shouldn't have to wait too much longer. Most likely earlier in the week then later.

Zyra was the last mage we began work on, which is why her dev blog is coming later.

Wait...
There is an order?

Will these updates come from time to time, starting with Brand, followed by Vel'Koz etc.? Or will you release all Mage Updates at the same time, comparable with the Marksmen Update?

They will all be released at the same time. Some of the designers worked on 2 champions though, as there are 4 designers in total on the roster project. RR and 20thCentrutyFaux both worked on 2 of the Mage projects, which is why the Cass and Zyra posts came later. Vlad came later because Vlad took us a bit longer to figure out what we wanted to do with him as he will probably be the largest update of the 6, at least from at art/animation scope perspective.
When you say art/animation are you referring to just abilities/ icons? Or are some of the mages getting a bit more?

Just abilities and icons. I was actually referring to specifically abilities in that comment. Vlad will likely have 2 abilities changed rather then 1. We don't feel we can sell the "blood lord" fantasy and solve his game health issues in one ability.
Sheesh! Why was you so straightforward? You scared him off!
so with the way you are wording this, it sounds as if half of them are almost ready for QA testing. and the other half are in early development testing

Thanks for the update Reav3!

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
i thought early in the week was monday/tuesday ;;
Last... but hopefully not least. :) Zyra is fragile, please handle with care!
Its true! i've been checking like every day in the hopes for the thread and its like "vladamir" after like 1 day for brand.

I know!! 

We must stay strong, fam!
i just hope that "leaked" zyra kit that was on reddit like 2 weeks ago isn't legit, i dont want her to turn int oa jungler ;;

I'm a jungle Zyra main these days but I would definitely have to agree with you.

One of the best things about Zyra is how flexible a pick she is! 

That leak was so overloaded though haha. They gave her a healing plant. 

The Zyra I know kills things, not heals them.
seeing people say "shes a plant so she should heal" bothered me so much, shes a predator not a healer. unless she healed from her plants killing things because that'd make sense.

Siphoning life through carnivorous plants would make sense thematically imo.

An aoe healing lotus flower... no that's just not Zyra at all haha

> [{quoted}](name=Chortle,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1gxjzmFQ,comment-id=000a0000000000000000,timestamp=2016-03-14T05:35:14.622+0000)
>
> I'm a jungle Zyra main these days but I would definitely have to agree with you.
> 
> One of the best things about Zyra is how flexible a pick she is! 
> 
> That leak was so overloaded though haha. They gave her a healing plant. 
> 
> The Zyra I know kills things, not heals them.

I don't mind if YOU want to play jungle Zyra.

But I will be inordinately upset if they turn her into a jungler.  (I can just see them going, "plants belong in the jungle guys!")  She's not designed as a jungler.  She's never been designed as a jungler, and her playerbase doesn't use her to jungle as a rule.

That's exactly what I stated above 

She's unique in that she can fulfill multiple roles. If they decide to change that, they are changing one of the many things Zyra mains love about her.

Please don't mess her up too badly.

I mostly like my main the way she is.  Most of what I want are bug fixes and a new passive.
It's just not up yet. It'll be there eventually.
I saw something about a diver's update? I think a example of that was Aatrox...Think we can set for a more aggresive Kayle? With more use of her wings? Just a thought.

Y'know...I was really excited initially about Zyra getting some work. Preseason and a lot of recent balancing changes really killed that excitement. Frankly, I just don't trust them with mages. Riot is obviously ok with mages being shit for years on end, but they're also ok with shipping totally broken OP cancer and looking the other way. 

I really don't want either of those things to happen, but I *especially* worry they'll fuck her up and then pull a CassioSona. Remember the "massive buff" from the plant AI changes that did nothing to fix broken plant targeting priorities? And the reverted .5 second knockup duration on her ulti that was just too powerful? Clueless comments about her winrate in a vacuum. {{item:3151}} and {{item:3020}} aren't even listed as recommended items. Riot totally lacks any understanding of Zyra, her players, or how she functions in any given meta.

On the bright side, Riot has managed to give themselves lots of room to succeed with my expectations being as low as they are. Just think about all the most recent reworks: {{champion:82}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:17}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:41}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:78}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:72}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:82}}. Does anyone really want Zyra to be pick/ban cancer, inherently unbalancable, objectively bad, or totally unrecognizable? If not, why do you think that's not going to happen?

Literally the only rework I can even think of that gave me a champ I liked better than the original was {{champion:22}}
